data.description:
Have you ever heard of The Place from Reddit ?
Canvas is basically the same thing, except it's in VR.

Contribute to this massive canvas made of +260k pixels.
You can drop droplets of ink to color each pixel and make the 2D pixelated creation you dream of.
Bring your friends to create bigger artworks, the canvas is common to everyone else.
And turn on that sweet radio to listen to some music from my other games while you're drawing.

Join my Discord server to get real-time updates of the Canvas !

changelog.change_log:
Update v18 is now available for Canvas !

Here are the patch notes :

- The usernames of other players are now displayed above their heads when you are close enough. This can be particularly useful for reporting players with inappropriate behavior.
- Highly improved the visuals of the app. Everything now appears sharper than ever ! (while keeping the 90fps target on the Quest 2)
- Various networking optimizations
- Updated the tracklist of the radio

**Update v18 is now available for Canvas !**
Here are the patch notes :
- The usernames of other players are now displayed above their heads when you are close enough. This can be particularly useful for reporting players with inappropriate behavior.
- Highly improved the visuals of the app. Everything now appears sharper than ever ! (while keeping the 90fps target on the Quest 2)
- Various networking optimizations
- Updated the tracklist of the radio

- You can now adjust the music's volume by clicking on the music button multiple times
- Your local time is now displayed on the left controller
- The Happy Hour type will now be selected randomly each week

Patch v14 - Patch notes :
+ New songs in the radio ! (the ones from Spotify)
- Fixed a bug that would always enable music when the app starts
- New events coming soon !

v13 Patch notes :
+ Added loudness equalization to the radio
+ New music : "Canvas - Drop"

Happy Hours v2 are now available :
+ Happy hours will now happen every friday and saturday at 3pm UTC
+ Shoot fireworks during happy hours !
+ 8x more colors to choose from during happy hours !
- New opening music for happy hours
- The total number of color droplets dropped is now displayed
- Prepared some super secret events

Hey artists ! Here are the patch notes :

+ New "?" emote
+ Hats inventory : keep all your owned hats without having to enter codes again !
- Voice chat is now louder
- Improved the auto-reconnection (faster + now keeps your rotation)
- Lowered the emote cooldown from 3 to 2 seconds
- Tweaks & Bug fixes

See you on the Canvas !

Hey artists ! Here are the patch notes :

+ New "?" emote
+ Hats inventory : keep all your owned hats without having to enter codes again !
- Voice chat is now louder
- Improved the auto-reconnection (faster + now keeps your rotation)
- Lowered the emote cooldown from 3 to 2 seconds
- Tweaks & Bug fixes

See you on the Canvas !

Update v1.5/v1.6 patch notes :
+ Happy hours ! Meet other artists during this special event each friday at 3pm UTC !
+ Shortcuts ! Press A to get the teleport ink, press B to get the color picker ink !
+ Emotes ! You can know express yourself even if you don't want to or can't speak !
- The auto-reconnect feature is now up to 8x faster
- Improved server stability
- The "paint" sound is now the same on all clients
- Added extra particles to the star skin
- Bug fixes

Update v1.5 patch notes :
+ Happy hours ! Meet other artists during this special event each friday at 3pm UTC !
+ Shortcuts ! Press A to get the teleport ink, press B to get the color picker ink !
- The auto-reconnect feature is now up to 8x faster

- Bug fixes

Update v1.5 patch notes :

+ Shortcuts ! Press A to get the teleport ink, press B to get the color picker ink !
- The auto-reconnect feature is now up to 8x faster
- Improved server stability
- Bug fixes

Patch v1.4 :
+ New administration system server-side (to ban toxic people)
+ Auto-reconnect !
- Multiple bug fixes

Patch v1.3 :
+ New star cosmetic (join the Discord server for more infos)
+ You can now see the hands of other players !

Canvas App Lab release ! (v1.2)

+ Customization ! You can now select your skin color and earn special hats during events
+ New Crop To Discord feature
+ Snap Turn
+ Leaderboards (Quest version only)
+ Cloud saves (Quest version only)
+ There's now about 20 minutes of Wasplay music in the radio !
- The Color Picker tool now automatically disables itself once used
